CustomField.description: The operators available for the filter field. Separate with semicolon (;). Available operators are: equals, greater than, less than, equal to blank, not equal to blank, contains
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The operators available for the filter field. Separate with comma (;). Available operators are: equals, greater than, less than, equal to blank, not equal to blank, contains
CustomField.label: Operators
